articles.author: Dashveenjit Kaur
articles.title: EU green lights Microsoft-Activision Blizzard merger. What's next? - Tech Wire Asia
articles.description: The EU has approved the US$69 billion acquisition offer by Microsoft for the Call of Duty creator Activision Blizzard.
articles.content:
• The EU has approved the US$69 billion acquisition offer by Microsoft for the Call of Duty creator Activision Blizzard.
  • The European Commission’s approval revives Microsoft’s hopes for… [+4987 chars]
